metadata.title: Independent tasks scheduling in cloud computing via improved estimation of distribution algorithm

rows: Set the initial population $Z_{0}$ be empty, selected population $S_{0}$ be empty, generation counter $g=0$. Initialization: Generate $Z_{0}=\left\{X_{1}, X_{2}, \ldots, X_{N}\right\}$ with the proposed population initialization method.
3.2 Selection: $S_{g-1} \leftarrow$ Select the top $M$ individuals in term of objective values in non-decreasing order.
$S_{g} \leftarrow S_{g}(1) \leftarrow S_{g}(2)$ and apply elitism criterion: $w_{g} \leftarrow b_{g-1}$
The best individual in $Z_{G}$ is the final solution.
